amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the VA Medical Facilities account by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 220 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase funding for the VA Medical Facilities account by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 6 (Roll no. 397).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 6 (Roll no. 397).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A075) offered by Mr. Golden.
